languages.text: "Если вы говорите правду — {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} не оставит вас. Если лжете — не уйдете от Его возмездия".

traits.locale_text: "Если вы говорите правду — {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} не оставит вас. Если лжете — не уйдете от Его возмездия".

languages.text: "If you speak truthfully, the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} will not forsake you. If you are lying, you will not escape His retribution."
languages.original_text: "Если вы говорите правду — {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} не оставит вас. Если лжете — не уйдете от Его возмездия".

traits.locale_text: "If you speak truthfully, the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} will not forsake you. If you are lying, you will not escape His retribution."
"If you speak truthfully, the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} will not forsake you. If you are lying, you will not escape His retribution."
"If you speak truthfully, the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} will not forsake you. If you are lying, you will not escape His retribution."
"If you speak truthfully, the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} will not forsake you. If you are lying, you will not escape His retribution."
"If you speak truthfully, the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} will not forsake you. If you are lying, you will not escape His retribution."

languages.text: “如果你说的是实话，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}必将庇佑你。而如果你在说谎，就准备迎接祂的怒火吧。”
languages.original_text: "If you speak truthfully, the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} will not forsake you. If you are lying, you will not escape His retribution."

traits.locale_text: “如果你说的是实话，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}必将庇佑你。而如果你在说谎，就准备迎接祂的怒火吧。”

languages.text: «Si habla con sinceridad, el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} no l{mf|e|a} abandonará. Si miente, no escapará a Su retribución».
languages.original_text: "If you speak truthfully, the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} will not forsake you. If you are lying, you will not escape His retribution."

traits.locale_text: «Si habla con sinceridad, el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} no l{mf|e|a} abandonará. Si miente, no escapará a Su retribución».

languages.text: 「もしあなたが真実を語っているなら、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}はあなたを見捨てないでしょう。ですが、嘘をついているならば、皇帝の天罰から免れることはできない」
languages.original_text: "If you speak truthfully, the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} will not forsake you. If you are lying, you will not escape His retribution."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが真実を話せば{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}はあなたを見捨てないでしょう。嘘をつけば、皇帝の復讐から逃れることはできない」
「もしあなたが真実を語っているなら、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}はあなたを見捨てないでしょう。ですが、嘘をついているならば、皇帝の天罰から免れることはできない」

languages.original_text: "If you speak truthfully, the Emperor will not forsake you. If you are lying, you will not escape His retribution."

languages.text: « Si vous dites la vérité, l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} ne vous abandonnera pas. Si vous mentez, vous n'échapperez pas à Son châtiment. »
languages.original_text: "If you speak truthfully, the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} will not forsake you. If you are lying, you will not escape His retribution."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous dites la vérité, l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} ne vous abandonnera pas. Si vous mentez, vous n'échapperez pas à Son châtiment. »

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr die Wahrheit sprecht, wird der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} Euch nicht im Stich lassen. Solltet Ihr lügen, werdet Ihr Seiner Vergeltung nicht entgehen."
languages.original_text: "If you speak truthfully, the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} will not forsake you. If you are lying, you will not escape His retribution."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr die Wahrheit sprecht, wird der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} Euch nicht im Stich lassen. Solltet Ihr lügen, werdet Ihr Seiner Vergeltung nicht entgehen."

languages.text: "Ağzından dökülenler hakikatse {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} seni yüzüstü bırakmayacaktır. Eğer ki yalansa gazabından kaçışın olmaz."
languages.original_text: "If you speak truthfully, the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} will not forsake you. If you are lying, you will not escape His retribution."

traits.locale_text: "Ağzından dökülenler hakikatse {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} seni yüzüstü bırakmayacaktır. Eğer ki yalansa gazabından kaçışın olmaz."
